### Classification Example

We'll model the island of the penguins with two predictors in the same unit (mm): bill length and bill depth.

```{r, results = "hide"}
library(tidymodels)
tidymodels_prefer()
data(penguins)

penguins <- penguins %>% select(island, starts_with("bill_"))
penguins_train <- penguins[-c(21, 153, 31, 277, 1), ]
penguins_test  <- penguins[ c(21, 153, 31, 277, 1), ]
```
